text: 80% of enterprise data remains unstructured, underpinning critical business workflows and requiring manual processing today. To transform customer experiences, drive bottom-line efficiencies, and achieve full digital transformation, organizations need to automate manual processes reliant on unstructured data.
text.1: At Instabase, we're passionate about democratizing access to cutting-edge AI innovation to enable any organization to solve previously unsolvable unstructured data problems in their industry. With customers representing some of the largest financial institutions in the world, and investors like Greylock, Andreessen Horowitz, and Index Ventures, our market opportunity is undeniable.
text.2: At the center of our value proposition is our people, and we've built a fearlessly experimental, endlessly curious, customer focused team who together, are fundamentally changing how developers build and distribute intelligent business applications. Remote-first, at 300 employees and growing, and with office hubs in Menlo Park, New York, London and Bangalore, we're looking to add to our talent community so we can continue to harness the power of deep learning to transform our customer's most complex business processes.
text.3: Come help us build for the next stage of growth and scale -- accelerate your career with Instabase!
text.4: is responsible for designing and developing a distributed operating system platform that powers Instabase=E2=80=99s services and applications. This involves working across a wide array of services that comprise the core components of the operating system, including file services, database storage, access control, account management, authentication, encryption, search and more.
text.5: , you=E2=80=99ll work on building and scaling a backend infrastructure that can run millions of tasks on thousands of machines with reliable SLA guarantees. You=E2=80=99ll work closely with other engineers in designing the infrastructure as well as interfaces for new applications.
text.6: Our infrastructure is written in Go, Python, Java, and C++ and operates using the micro-services model. We use Docker and Kubernetes for our deployments.

li: Enable the front-end engineers to develop the Instabase UI around the platform
li.1: Support the customer deployment and delivery team with customer infrastructure integrations
li.2: Develop new features that can be leveraged by the other Instabase teams to develop apps and solutions
li.3: Provide a public-facing SDK for customers to consume

text: Direct interactions with customers to deliver and iterate on product features

li.2: Cloud Services: Google Cloud, AWS, Azure
li.3: Languages: Go, Python, Java, C++ (one or more is welcome)
li.4: Web Toolkits, File Systems, Database Systems

text.7: Research shows that in order to apply for a job, women feel they need to meet 100% of the criteria while men usually apply after meeting about 60%. Regardless of how you identify, if you believe you can do the job and are a good match, we encourage you to apply.
text.8: Instabase is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity in all forms.
